info.title: User Sign-in and Appointment Booking API
info.description: API for user sign-in, two-factor authentication, and booking appointments

post.description: Allows a user to sign in with email and password

success.description: Indicates if the login was successful

requires_2fa.description: Indicates if the user is required to complete 2FA

post.description: Allows a user to verify with email and OTP code

otp_code.description: The OTP code sent to the user's email

success.description: Indicates if the verification was successful

post.description: Allows a user to book an appointment with a doctor

period.description: The period of the appointment (e.g., AM or PM)

consultationType.description: Type of consultation (e.g., In-Person or Virtual)

problemDescription.description: A brief description of the medical issue

example.problemDescription: Shortness of breath and chest pain

appointment_id.description: The ID of the booked appointment

success.description: Indicates if the booking was successful

post.description: Allows a user to report an illness

bodyPart.description: The part of the body that is ill (Head, Torso, LeftLeg, RightLeg, LeftHand, RightHand)

headache.description: Headache severity (if body part is Head)

visionIssues.description: Yes/No for vision problems (if body part is Head)

chestPain.description: Chest pain severity (if body part is Torso)

breathingDifficulty.description: Breathing difficulty severity (if body part is Torso)

leftLegPain.description: Left leg pain severity (if body part is LeftLeg)

rightLegPain.description: Right leg pain severity (if body part is RightLeg)

leftHandPain.description: Left hand pain severity (if body part is LeftHand)

rightHandPain.description: Right hand pain severity (if body part is RightHand)

example.symptom: I am having severe headache and blurry vision.

success.description: Indicates if the submission was successful

id.description: The ID of the reported medical issue

example.message: Invalid body part or missing required fields

get.description: Allows a user to fetch their health score

success.description: Indicates if the fetch was successful

post.description: Allows a user to add a new timeline entry

date.description: The date of the timeline entry (YYYY-MM-DD)

time.description: The time of the timeline entry (HH:MM)

long_description.description: Detailed description of the timeline entry

description.description: Brief description of the timeline entry

example.long_description: Visited the doctor for a routine check-up. Everything seems to be in order.

timeline_id.description: The ID of the added timeline entry

success.description: Indicates if the addition was successful

get.description: Allows a user to fetch their medication information

start_date.description: The start date of the medication (YYYY-MM-DD)

success.description: Indicates if the fetch was successful

get.description: Allows a user to fetch their timeline entries

timeline_id.description: The ID of the timeline entry

date.description: The date of the timeline entry (YYYY-MM-DD)

time.description: The time of the timeline entry (HH:MM)

long_description.description: Detailed description of the timeline entry

description.description: Brief description of the timeline entry

success.description: Indicates if the fetch was successful

timelines.long_description: Visited the doctor for a routine check-up. Everything seems to be in order.
Picked up new prescription for high blood pressure medication.

put.description: Allows a user to edit an existing appointment

id.description: The ID of the appointment to be edited

period.description: The period of the appointment (e.g., AM or PM)

consultationType.description: Type of consultation (e.g., In-Person or Virtual)

success.description: Indicates if the edit was successful

get.description: Allows a user to fetch their doctor notes

note_id.description: The ID of the doctor note

date.description: The date of the doctor note (YYYY-MM-DD)

note_text.description: The text content of the doctor note

success.description: Indicates if the fetch was successful

doctor_notes.note_text: Patient reported shortness of breath and chest pain. Prescribed Aspirin and scheduled follow-up appointment.
Patient's blood pressure is within normal range. Continued current medication regimen.

delete.description: Allows a user to delete their specific appointment

id.description: The unique identifier of the appointment

success.description: Indicates if the deletion was successful

example.message: Invalid email format or appointment ID

get.description: Allows a user to fetch all their appointments

success.description: Indicates if the fetch was successful
